FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_hackathon.summary: Recent activities include multiple updates to the content of various pages, such as the Home page, problem-statement page, evaluation page, and resources page. Additionally, new logos were added and meta keywords were updated. There were also several push events with content updates.

FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: Recent activities involve cleanup of the code for simplicity, updates to xsl files for geometry point values, and changes to the exit code. There were also updates to the xmlparser file and ExplicitLink to resolve differences between y values. Multiple pull requests were merged, including those for geometry and xcosblocks.

FOSSEE/fossee-banners.summary: Recent activities include the addition of a new banner for the Scilab hackathon and an update to the link of an existing banner. These changes were made through push events and pull requests.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: Recent activity includes the generation of Arduino Workshop Certificates through a push event.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_portal.summary: Recent activity involves adding a description under the project title, which was directly added from GitHub through a push event.
